inair.event

Class EventRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.event.EventRoute

  • public class EventRoute
extends java.lang.Object

    Container for the route to be followed by a RoutedEvent when raised


    EventRoute constitutes a non-null RoutedEvent and an ordered list of (target object, handler list) pairs It facilitates adding new entries to this list and also allows for the handlers in the list to be invoked

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Object target,
       Delegate<? extends RoutedEventArgs> handler)

        Adds this handler for the specified target to the route


        It is not an error to add a handler for a particular target instance twice (handler will simply be called twice).
        Parameters:
        target - Target object whose handler is to be added to the route
        handler - Handler to be added to the route

      • getRoutedEvent

        public RoutedEvent getRoutedEvent()
        Returns:
        routed event

      • invokeHandlers

        public final void invokeHandlers(java.lang.Object source,
                  RoutedEventArgs args)

        Invokes all the handlers that have been added to the route


        If the RoutingStrategy of the associated RoutedEvent is RoutingStrategy.Bubble the last handlers added are the last ones invoked
        However if the RoutingStrategy of the associated RoutedEvent is RoutingStrategy.Tunnel, the last handlers added are the first ones invoked
        Parameters:
        source - that raised the RoutedEvent
        args - that carry all the details specific to this RoutedEvent
